original: Bratt, Gustaf Adolf, kammarherre, ryttmästare, generalkonsul, Jonsered, f. 17/9/94 i Lerum, Älvsb. 1., av gen:-kons. Adolf B. o. Gertrud Kjellberg. G. 2. m. Marianne Wästfelt. Barn: Hervor f. 24, Lennart 26, Monica 36, Yvonne 39, Christina 41, Marianne 44. — Stud. v, Gbgs h. real o. Gbgs hand:-inst., aff:utb. i Engl. två år, i USA ett år, i Frankr. ett år. Und:löjtn. i Livreg. t. h. res. 15, ryttmäst. 31. Inneh. Brattkoncernen. Ordf. o. verk-st. dir. i Angf. A-B AdoiLf, Öister-sjön o. Nordsjön, i Red. A-B Götiha, i Bratts Kol & Koks A-B o. A-B Godolphin, ordf. i Jonsson, Sternha-gen & Co. A->B. Lettl. ikonsul i Gbg 28-36, Turkiets genera|lkonsul i Gbg 36-46, Belg. konsul i Gbg fr. 45. Äg. Ekenäs o. Guliringsbo i Jonsered. V. ordf. i dir. f. Gbgs sjöm:hus, i Gbgs fältrittkl., styr :led. i Försäkr. A-B Ocean, i A-B Argo, i Sv. hand :bank. avd:kont., i Sv. ångf :assur :fören., i Protection o. Indemnity, i sjöf:intr:-fond., i Elkab i Gbg A-B, i Sv. red:-fören. und :st :kassas beredn :utsk., i Sv. sällsk. f. räddn. av skeppsbr., i A-B Bränsleimp. i Halmstad, styr:-suppl. i The balt. and. intern, marit. conference i Köpenhamn, i Sv. reda-refören., i Färg A-B International, i Gbgs Bogser. & Bärgn. A-B, i Gbgs Stuv. A-B, i Marstrands Turisthot., i A-B Äbyfält., i Västsv. trav- o. ga-loppsällsk. Av K. Maj :t uts. rev. i Gbgs hand:högsk., rev. i Barnens dag, deput. i ränte- o. kap :försäkr :anst., led. av Sv. red :fören, sjöm :hems-komm., fullm. i riksförb. f. Sv:es för-sv., led. av Sv. inst. råd, intern, hand:-kamm., Sv. nat :komm. repr. i Com. des transp. par mer. Styr. recor i Göta Coldinu O., medl. av The council i Anglo-Swed. ’soc., i The Royal Bach. Club, i Gbgs jaktsällsk. jäg:kl. m. fl. Hobbies: ridn., jakt, segl. KV02kll, RNO, fd. kanisilis t v. KM O, KFinilLO-Ikil, KFindVRO, KBLeopII :,sO, KLett-SO, RDDO, ChrX:,sFrM, TGM, Ho’1’1-RKHt, LettRKHt.
translated: Bratt, Gustaf Adolf, Chamberlain, Captain, Consul General, Jonsered, b. 17/9/94 in Lerum, Älvsb. 1., son of Consul General Adolf B. and Gertrud Kjellberg. Married twice, first to Marianne Wästfelt. Children: Hervor b. 24, Lennart b. 26, Monica b. 36, Yvonne b. 39, Christina b. 41, Marianne b. 44. — Studied at Gothenburg Higher Real Gymnasium and Gothenburg Commercial Institute, with business education in England for two years, one year in the USA, one year in France. Second Lieutenant in the Life Regiment, transferred to the reserves in 1915 and Captain in 1931. Owner of the Bratt Group. Chairman and Managing Director of Angf. A-B Adolph, Öistersjön and Nordsjön, Red. A-B Götiha, Bratts Kol & Koks A-B and A-B Godolphin, Chairman of Jonsson, Sternhagen & Co. A-B. Honorary Consul in Gothenburg from 1928 to 1936, Turkey's Consul General in Gothenburg from 1936 to 1946, Belgium's Consul in Gothenburg from 1945. Owner of Ekenäs and Gullringsbo in Jonsered. Vice Chairman of the Board of Directors for Gothenburg Naval House, Gothenburg Equestrian Club, Board of Directors for Försäkr. A-B Ocean, A-B Argo, Sv. hand : bank. avd: kont., and Sv. ångf : assur: fören., board member of Protection and Indemnity, Marine Insurance Fund, Elkab in Gbg A-B, and Sv. red : fören. und : st : kassas Beredn : utsk., among others. Member of the Board of Directors for A-B Bränsleimp. in Halmstad, Board of Supervisors for The Balt. and Intern, Break. Conference in Copenhagen, Board of Directors for Färg A-B International, Gothenburg Towing and Salvage A-B, Gothenburg Stuv. A-B, Marstrand Tourist Hotel, A-B Äbyfält., and Västsv. trav- o. ga -lopp Sällsk. Appointed by His Majesty as a Reviewer at Gothenburg School of Business and Reviewer for Children's Day, Deputy for the Interest and Capital Insurance Institution, member of the Swedish Red Cross, Navy Home Committee, representative for Sweden in the Com. des transp. par mer.  Recor. for Göta Coldinu O., member of The Council in Anglo-Swed. 'Soc., The Royal Bach Club, Gothenburg Hunt Society, jäg:kl. and more. Hobbies include: horse riding, hunting, sailing. Decorations: KV02kll, RNO, former member of the Counsel of the Order of the Polar Star, KFinilLO-Ikil, KFindVRO, KBLeopII :,sO, KLett-SO, RDDO, ChrX:,sFrM, TGM, Ho'1'T-RKHt, LettRKHt.
